TextView.android:text: Call yourself a crossword mastermind? Then try this ultimate defiance! The mysteriously obscure game comes with mind boggling clues, decipher it in a devious way! Twist your brain inside out to read the clue in the way it tells you! \n \nCome in teams of 2. Each team will be given a sheet of clues. They have to solve it in the given time. The top 4 teams will be given a board each and they will have to fill in the answers. The team who completes it first ,wins!
